media:group.media:title: The Poetic programming language
media:group.media:description:
What doth coding and poetry have in common? An esolang by any other name would run as leisurely.

Today, we'll be looking at the poetic programming language, a brainfuck derivative with an interesting twist.

Also discussed : The shakespeare and rockstar languages.

LINKS: 

Poetic language homepage
https://mcaweb.matc.edu/winslojr/vicom128/final/download/index.html
Poetic on esolangs
https://esolangs.org/wiki/Poetic

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6avJHaC3C2U&ab_channel=NDCConferences
